turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, how can i help you!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yea, I need to order four large pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. 4 large pizzas coming right up. what did you want on those?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Three pepperonis, with one of them that has jalapeños and then one cheese pizza. All of them have extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you say you wanted 4 large pizzas, 2 pepperoni, 1 pepperoni with jalapenos, and 1 cheese pizza, all with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great. the total for this order is $55.45.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you want me to place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. And tell me when it's ready for pickup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. i've submitted your order. it'll b ready for pick up in 45 mins.
